questions: How quickly were decisions made using CLAUDE.md guidance?
Which preferences required interpretation vs immediate action?
How many cross-references were needed per task?

assessment: Identify points where guidance was unclear
Note areas requiring multiple reference checks

memory_load.evaluation: Assess which preferences are consistently remembered vs forgotten

questions: Which preferences actively solved problems in this session?
What measurable improvements resulted from following preferences?
Which preferences prevented errors or saved time?

assessment: Which preferences were ignored or forgotten?
How well did preferences adapt to session context?

principle_alignment.evaluation: Do all applied preferences support 'Simple and Easy' principle?

hierarchy_clarity.assessment: Evaluate clarity of preference relationships and priorities
hierarchy_clarity.integration: Note challenges with new pattern integration

evolution_capacity.opportunities: Identify areas where framework could adapt better
evolution_capacity.maintenance: Assess effort required to keep guidance current

consolidation_opportunities: Identify preferences that could be merged
cognitive_load_reductions: Complex decision trees that could be simplified
Reference patterns that cause context switching
effectiveness_improvements: Preferences that need clearer action language

high_priority: Consolidate preferences showing low utility scores
Simplify preferences causing cognitive load spikes
Clarify preferences with high interpretation requirements
medium_priority: Add automation for frequently manual preferences
Create examples for abstract guidance patterns
framework_evolution: Consider preference categorization by usage frequency
Implement progressive disclosure for complex workflows
Add measurement integration for key preferences

immediate_actions: Update high-friction preferences with clearer language
Add examples to preferences requiring interpretation
framework_updates: Modify CLAUDE.md structure based on usage patterns
Implement measurement tracking for key preferences
Create automation scripts for manual preference tasks
validation_requirements: Test revised preferences in next session
